title: Our Days
overview: Coming from rural Thailand, Mon moves to Bangkok to start university. On his first day in the big city, he meets Soh, a local musician, who shows him around. During a drunk night, Soh kisses Mon. Mon, confused, leaves. However, Mon quickly finds out Soh is also a freshman in his same faculty! Soh learns of Mon's love for basketball and decides to join the same team with him. In one of the matches, Mon gets injured and Soh starts taking care of him. Saint, Mon's high school teammate, confesses his love for him too. In the end, which team will Mon choose? Soh or Saint?
